stories.title: Role-Based Navigation
stories.description: As a user, I want the navigation to show only the items relevant to my role so that I can focus on my responsibilities.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin role sees all navigation items (Dashboard, Action Centre, Associates, Clients, Contracts, Earnings, Schedule, CPD, Support)
Associate role sees limited navigation (Dashboard, My Clients, My Schedule, My Earnings, CPD, Support)
Navigation updates dynamically when role changes
Current user role is displayed in sidebar footer
verifiableTests: Set currentUserRole to 'admin' and verify all 9 nav items are visible
Set currentUserRole to 'associate' and verify only 6 nav items are visible
Toggle between roles and confirm nav updates without page refresh
Verify role badge displays correctly in sidebar

stories.title: Authentication State Display
stories.description: As a user, I want to see my logged-in status and profile information so that I know my session is active.
acceptanceCriteria: User avatar/initials displayed in header
User name displayed when logged in
Login button shown when logged out
Session expiry warning shown 5 minutes before timeout
verifiableTests: Set isLoggedIn to true and verify user profile appears in header
Set isLoggedIn to false and verify login button appears
Simulate session timeout warning and verify alert displays

stories.title: Associate Self-Service View
stories.description: As an associate, I want to see only my own data when logged in so that I can manage my practice efficiently.
acceptanceCriteria: Associates see only their assigned clients
Associates see only their own sessions in schedule
Associates see only their own earnings
Associates cannot access other associates' data
verifiableTests: Login as associate ASSOC-2401 and verify only their clients appear
Verify schedule shows only sessions for current associate
Verify earnings show only current associate's revenue

stories.title: Mobile Navigation Enhancement
stories.description: As a mobile user, I want smooth navigation with proper touch targets so that I can use the portal effectively on my phone.
acceptanceCriteria: Hamburger menu button visible on mobile
Sidebar slides in smoothly on tap
Touch targets are minimum 44px
Swipe-to-close works on sidebar
verifiableTests: Resize to mobile breakpoint and verify hamburger menu appears
Tap hamburger and verify sidebar slides in from left
Measure touch targets to confirm 44px minimum
Swipe left on sidebar to close it

stories.title: View Access Control
stories.description: As an admin, I want to control which views are accessible to different roles so that data remains secure.
acceptanceCriteria: Attempting to access restricted view shows access denied message
URL manipulation cannot bypass role restrictions
Action Centre items filtered by role permissions
Sensitive data hidden from non-admin roles
verifiableTests: As associate, try to access Associates view and verify access denied
Manually call showView('associates') as associate and verify blocked
Verify Friction Feed hides admin-only items for associates
